title: Unexpected Platform Error
body:
When I select masteries I get this popup message saying "unexpected platform error".

The game starts. It says I have no masteries.

I'm sure I read about this bug back in 2013. Still no fix?

replies.body:
Hey DESUDESUDESU,

Can you try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article)? This should fix the issue, but if it doesn't, please let me know.
